alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 20 at 6:15AM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is expected or occurring. * WHERE...A portion of central Nebraska, including the following county, Sherman. * WHEN...Until 615 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 611 AM CST, the automated river gauge on the Middle Loup River near Rockville indicated an ice jam causing minor flooding in the warned area. The ice jam could persist for several days and water levels will fluctuate due to the icing. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Areas along the Middle Loup River near Loup City and Rockville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
